title: Mittag-Leffler function
summary: In mathematics,  the Mittag-Leffler function E α , β {\displaystyle E_{\alpha ,\beta }} is a special function, a complex function which depends on two complex parameters α {\displaystyle \alpha } and β {\displaystyle \beta } .
